name: ShopKeep'r
description:
In this game, you take the role of a former adventurer who has decided to open a shop for the new generation of adventurers. However, managing a shop is not as easy to you as adventuring was, will you be able to avoid bankruptcy and become a great shopkeeper?

This game was created as an exploration of data management and manipulation.

This game was created as part of an assignment for my Game Design Degree.
